amuse.interfaces.nodes.methods
Interface AmuseTaskInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AmuseTask, AORSplitter, BeatPruner, DataSampler, DensityBasedOutlierDetectorAdapter, DerivationCalculator, DistanceBasedOutlierDetectorAdapter, EvolutionaryStrategy, GMMConverter, IntervalSelector, J48Adapter, JAudioAdapter, KNNAdapter, LinearDiscriminantAnalysisAdapter, LinearDiscriminantAnalysisAdapter, LOFOutlierDetectorAdapter, MatlabAdapter, NaiveBayesAdapter, NaNEliminator, NFoldCrossValidator, NormalizerWithGivenMinMax, OnsetPruner, PrincipalComponentsAnalysis, QuartileConverter, RandomForestAdapter, RapidMinerModelLoader, RunningMeanCalculator, SingleEvaluator, StructureGMMConverter, SVMAdapter, TatumPruner, YaleAdapter, ZeroMeanUnitVarianceNormalizer
public interface AmuseTaskInterface

All algorithms implement this interface. The algorithm runs one of Amuse tasks and is "method" (completely implemented in Amuse) or "adapter" (runs an external tool).

Version:
$Id: AmuseTaskInterface.java 14 2008-04-11 10:13:58Z vatolkin $
Author:
Igor Vatolkin
